title: Consular Affairs Division to remain open for limited services
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); The Ministry of Foreign Affairs says that the Consular Affairs Division will be open for very limited services to the public on Monday, 13 June, for limited services.
The decision has been taken in consideration of the high number of service seekers at the Consular Affairs Division of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs.

Therefore, the Consular Affairs Division will be open for very limited services to the public on Monday, from 7.30am to 4.30pm, which was declared as a special holiday for Government Offices in accordance with the instructions of the Public Administration Ministry.
The Consular Affairs Division will be closed on Tuesday, 14 June 2022, on account of the Poson Poya day and will open on Wednesday, 15 June for regular functions.
Simultaneously, the Regional Consular Offices in Jaffana, Matara, Kandy, Trincomalee and Kurunegala will also be opened for limited services on Monday, 13 June.
